title: Muskmelon ( Cantaloupe ) Puree Recipe For Babies
content: Melons are such a wonder food for your babies during hot summer days. Since they are filled with lots of water content, they make a yummy dish for your baby, plus you don't have to cook them. These melons are rich in vitamin A, vitamin C, and calcium. title: Sweet Potato ( Mashed ) Puree Recipe for Babies
content: Sweet Potatoes are such wholesome food to give for babies. It has so many health benefits, read all of them here. I boil sweet potatoes and feed, but to bring out the maximum sweetness from them, it is best to oven roast them, just slice them in half, wrap them in foil and roast it for 40 to 45 m

title: Banana (Mashed) Puree Recipe for Babies
content:
In our place, we get a banana called Matti Pazham. It is small in size and easy to digest for the baby. You can feed any small variety banana for your baby in their raw form. But nendrapazham which is called as ripe plantain should be steamed.

content:
I should have posted this recipe right after this one. I have written in detail about spicing your baby's food. In my apple oatmeal recipe, I spiced it with a touch of cinnamon. Now in my pear oatmeal, I added a touch of cardamom and it was yummy.
